questions: Please provide me with the first names of all employees.

questions: What kind of organization is Altrecht?
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT organisatie.naam, COUNT(*) FROM organisatie LEFT JOIN systeeminstelling on systeeminstelling.organisatie_id = organisatie.id WHERE systeeminstelling.naam = 'Altrecht' GROUP BY organisatie.naam
answers_golden_standard: SELECT referrerorganization.NAME as organization_name, referrerorganizationtype.NAME as organization_type FROM referrerorganization LEFT JOIN referrerorganizationtype on referrerorganizationtype.id = referrerorganization.referrerorganizationtype_id WHERE referrerorganization.NAME = 'Altrecht'

questions: Can you explain to me what kind of organization Altrecht is?
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT naam, organisatievorm FROM organisatie WHERE naam = 'Altrecht'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT referrerorganization.NAME as organization_name, referrerorganizationtype.NAME as organization_type FROM referrerorganization LEFT JOIN referrerorganizationtype on referrerorganizationtype.id = referrerorganization.referrerorganizationtype_id WHERE referrerorganization.NAME = 'Altrecht'

answers_golden_standard: SELECT name, telephone FROM systemsocietynl

questions: Please provide me with all IDs of patients who are not currently insured.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT patient.id FROM patient LEFT JOIN verzekeringsstatus ON patient.verzekeringsstatus_id = verzekeringsstatus.id WHERE (verzekeringsstatus.einddatum < current_date OR verzekeringsstatus.einddatum IS NULL)
answers_golden_standard: SELECT patient_id, expiration_date, insured FROM insurancenl WHERE YEAR(expiration_date) = '9999' and insured = 'nee'

questions: Would you please provide me with the identification numbers of those who do not currently have a valid insurance policy?
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT patient.id FROM patient LEFT JOIN verzekeringsproduct on patient.huidig_verzekeringsproduct_id = verzekeringsproduct.id WHERE verzekeringsproduct.vervaldatum < CURRENT_DATE or patient.huidig_verzekeringsproduct_id IS NULL
answers_golden_standard: SELECT patient_id, expiration_date, insured FROM insurancenl WHERE YEAR(expiration_date) = '9999' and insured = 'nee'

answers_golden_standard: SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE YEAR(created) = 2023 ORDER BY created DESC

questions: Show me all appointments made in 2023, with the newest appointment at the top.

answers_golden_standard: SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE YEAR(created) = 2023 ORDER BY created DESC

questions: Show me the registration date, first and last name, care plan name and care plan start date of clients with care plans.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT patient.inschrijfdatum, patient.roepnaam, patient.eigennaam, zorgplan.naam, zorgplan.startdatum FROM patient LEFT JOIN zorgplan on zorgplan.patient_id = patient.id WHERE zorgplan.naam IS NOT NULL
answers_golden_standard: SELECT patient.firstnames, patient.given_name, patient.entry_date, carepathway.name, carepathway.startdate FROM patient INNER JOIN carepathway on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id

questions: Show me the enrollment date and names of clients, and name and care pathway start date of clients currently participating in a care pathway.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT patient.roepnaam, patient.eigennaam, zorgtraject.startdatum, patient_in_zorgtraject.eigen_startdatum FROM patient LEFT JOIN patient_in_zorgtraject on patient_in_zorgtraject.patient_id = patient.id AND patient_in_zorgtraject.eigen_einddatum IS NULL LEFT JOIN zorgtraject on zorgtraject.id = patient_in_zorgtraject.zorgtraject_id
answers_golden_standard: SELECT patient.firstnames, patient.given_name, patient.entry_date, carepathway.name, carepathway.startdate FROM patient INNER JOIN carepathway on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id

questions: Retrieve all IDs of patients where 'brummel' appears in the last name.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT id FROM patient WHERE achternaam LIKE '%brummel%'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT id FROM PATIENT WHERE lower(surname) LIKE '%brummel%'

questions: Obtain the identification numbers of patients in which the word 'brummel' is part of the last name.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT patient.ROEPNAAM, patient.EIGENNAAM, ziekenhuissysteem_patient.id FROM ziekenhuissysteem_patient WHERE patient.EIGENNAAM LIKE '%brummel%'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT id FROM PATIENT WHERE lower(surname) LIKE '%brummel%'

questions: Show me all patients and their privacy objections
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT patient.patientnummer, patient.privacy FROM patient
answers_golden_standard: SELECT DISTINCT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.privacy_objections FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id

questions: Show me a list of all patients including their privacy concerns
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT patient.*, patient_privacy.consent FROM patient LEFT JOIN patient_privacy on patient_privacy.patient_id = patient.id
answers_golden_standard: SELECT DISTINCT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.privacy_objections FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id

questions: How many psychiatrists do we have in our database?

answers_golden_standard: SELECT count(function) FROM employee WHERE lower(function) like '%psychiater%'

questions: How many psychiatrists are registered in our data?

answers_golden_standard: SELECT count(function) FROM employee WHERE lower(function) like '%psychiater%'

questions: Show me the list of patients without privacy concerns
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT * FROM patient_privacy WHERE privacy_concern = 'nee'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT DISTINCT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.privacy_objections FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on patient.referrer_id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE carepathway.privacy_objections = 'nee'

questions: Give me all the patients who have no privacy concerns
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT patient.* FROM patient LEFT JOIN patient_privacy_concern ON patient_privacy_concern.patient_id = patient.id WHERE patient_privacy_concern.id IS NULL
answers_golden_standard: SELECT DISTINCT patient.given_name, patient.surname, carepathway.privacy_objections FROM patient LEFT JOIN carepathway on patient.referrer_id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE carepathway.privacy_objections = 'nee'

questions: I want to know from all appointments after 2019 how many appointments per type there have been
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT afspraaktype, count(*) FROM afspraak WHERE year(afspraakdatumtijd) > 2019 GROUP BY afspraaktype
answers_golden_standard: SELECT appointmenttype.NAME, count(*) FROM appointmenttype LEFT JOIN appointment on appointment.appointmenttype_id = appointmenttype.id WHERE appointment.INTERVALSTART >= '2020-01-01' GROUP BY appointmenttype.NAME

questions: I request a list of the number of appointments, broken down by type, that took place after the year 2019.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT afspraaktype, count(*), FROM afspraak WHERE year(afspraakmoment) > 2019 GROUP BY afspraaktype
answers_golden_standard: SELECT appointmenttype.NAME, count(*) FROM appointmenttype LEFT JOIN appointment on appointment.appointmenttype_id = appointmenttype.id WHERE appointment.INTERVALSTART >= '2020-01-01' GROUP BY appointmenttype.NAME

questions: Which organization does I. Hendriksen work for?
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT werknemer.ORGANISATIENAAM FROM werknemer WHERE werknemer.voornaam = 'I.' and werknemer.achternaam = 'Hendriksen'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT referrerindividual.INITIALS, referrerindividual.SURNAME, referrerorganization.NAME FROM referrerorganization LEFT JOIN referrerindividual on referrerindividual.referrerorganization_id = referrerorganization.id WHERE referrerindividual.INITIALS = 'I' and referrerindividual.SURNAME = 'Hendriksen'

questions: Which organization does I. Hendriksen work for?
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT werkgever.ROEPNAAM, werkgever.EIGENNAAM, organisatie.NAAM FROM werknemer LEFT JOIN organisatie_zorgeenheid on werknemer.zorgeenheid_id = organisatie_zorgeenheid.id LEFT JOIN organisatie on organisatie.id = organisatie_zorgeenheid.organisatie_id WHERE werkgever.ROEPNAAM = 'I.' and werkgever.EIGENNAAM = 'Hendriksen'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT referrerindividual.INITIALS, referrerindividual.SURNAME, referrerorganization.NAME FROM referrerorganization LEFT JOIN referrerindividual on referrerindividual.referrerorganization_id = referrerorganization.id WHERE referrerindividual.INITIALS = 'I' and referrerindividual.SURNAME = 'Hendriksen'

questions: Please give me the IDs and names of the patients who started the depression pathway after 2018.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT id, standaardnaam FROM patient WHERE standaardnaam LIKE '%depressie%' and year(startdatum) > 2018
answers_golden_standard: SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname FROM carepathway LEFT JOIN patient on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE LOWER(carepathway.name) = 'depressie' and YEAR(carepathway.startdate) > 2018

questions: Show me the IDs and names of the patients who started the depression pathway after the year 2018.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT id, standaardnaam FROM patient WHERE DATEADD('year', 1, start_somatischelijn) < '2018-01-01'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname FROM carepathway LEFT JOIN patient on patient.id = carepathway.patient_id WHERE LOWER(carepathway.name) = 'depressie' and YEAR(carepathway.startdate) > 2018

questions: Please provide me of all patients their IDs, names and in which municipality they live
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT id, naam, geboorteplaats, FROM patient
answers_golden_standard: SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname, systemmunicipality.name FROM patient LEFT JOIN systempostalcode on systempostalcode.postalcode = IFF(patient.deleted='ja', '0000', LEFT(patient.postal_code,4)) LEFT JOIN systempostalcode_systemmunicipality on systempostalcode_systemmunicipality.systempostalcode_id = systempostalcode.id LEFT JOIN systemmunicipality on systemmunicipality.id = systempostalcode_systemmunicipality.systemmunicipality_id

questions: Please provide me with the identification numbers, full names and municipalities of all patients
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT id, volledigenaam, woonplaats FROM patient
answers_golden_standard: SELECT patient.id, patient.given_name, patient.surname, systemmunicipality.name FROM patient LEFT JOIN systempostalcode on systempostalcode.postalcode = IFF(patient.deleted='ja', '0000', LEFT(patient.postal_code,4)) LEFT JOIN systempostalcode_systemmunicipality on systempostalcode_systemmunicipality.systempostalcode_id = systempostalcode.id LEFT JOIN systemmunicipality on systemmunicipality.id = systempostalcode_systemmunicipality.systemmunicipality_id

questions: Provide me with the insurance company of patient 53
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT verzekeraar.* FROM patient LEFT JOIN verzekeraar on patient.verzekeraar_id = verzekeraar.id WHERE patient.id = 53
answers_golden_standard: SELECT systemsocietynl.* FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl on insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' LEFT JOIN systemsocietynl on systemsocietynl.id = insurancenl.society_id WHERE patient.id = 53

questions: Please grant me access to client 53's insurance company.
answers_GPT3_5: UPDATE client SET ziektekostenmaatschappij = 'zilverenkruis' WHERE id = 53
answers_golden_standard: SELECT systemsocietynl.* FROM patient LEFT JOIN insurancenl on insurancenl.patient_id = patient.id AND current_timestamp BETWEEN insurancenl.starting_date AND insurancenl.expiration_date AND insurancenl.coverage_type='basis' LEFT JOIN systemsocietynl on systemsocietynl.id = insurancenl.society_id WHERE patient.id = 53

questions: Which appointments involve clients who have not yet been notified?
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT afspraak.* FROM afspraak LEFT JOIN patient_afspraak_deelname ON patient_afspraak_deelname.afspraak_id = afspraak.id LEFT JOIN deelnemer ON deelnemer.id = patient_afspraak_deelname.deelnemer_id WHERE deelnemer.notification_status = 'not_notified'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentstatus on appointmentstatus.id = appointment.systemappointmentstatus_id WHERE appointmentstatus.name LIKE '%niet aangemeld%'

questions: Which appointments involve clients who are not yet enrolled?
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT afspraak.* FROM afspraak LEFT JOIN patient on patient.id = afspraak.patient_id WHERE patient.inschrijfdatum > current_date OR patient.inschrijfdatum is NULL
answers_golden_standard: SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentstatus on appointmentstatus.id = appointment.systemappointmentstatus_id WHERE appointmentstatus.name LIKE '%niet aangemeld%'

questions: Please show me all dental insurance policies that provide additional coverage
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT * FROM verzekering WHERE type = 'tandzorg' and dekkinguitbreiding = 1
answers_golden_standard: SELECT * FROM societypackage WHERE coverage_type = 'aanvullend' and lower(package_name) LIKE '%tand%' and lower(package_name) NOT LIKE '%standaard%'

questions: Show me all supplemental dental insurance policies
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT * FROM dekking WHERE naam = 'tand' and toevoegendekking = 1
answers_golden_standard: SELECT * FROM societypackage WHERE coverage_type = 'aanvullend' and lower(package_name) LIKE '%tand%' and lower(package_name) NOT LIKE '%standaard%'

questions: Show me all employees with a Medicore email address that have a landline phone number starting with 030
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT * FROM werknemer WHERE email LIKE '%medicore%' AND telefoon_werk LIKE '030%'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT * FROM employee WHERE email LIKE '%medicore%' and phonehome LIKE '030%'

questions: Show me the list of employees with a Medicore email address whose landline phone number starts with the digit sequence 030.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT * FROM werknemer_e_mail WHERE e_mail LIKE '%medicore%' INTERSECT SELECT * FROM werknemer_telefoon WHERE telefoon LIKE '030%'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT * FROM employee WHERE email LIKE '%medicore%' and phonehome LIKE '030%'

questions: Provide me with all appointments created in 2023 within the clinic, with the oldest appointment created at the top
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT * FROM afspraak WHERE intervalstart BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY intervalstart
answers_golden_standard: SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE YEAR(created) = 2023 and address_type = 'clinic' ORDER BY created

questions: Show me an ordered view of appointments within the clinic created in the year 2023, ordered by initial creation date, with the earliest created appointment shown first.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT * FROM afspraak WHERE YEAR(afspraak.datumtijd) = 2023 ORDER BY afspraak.aanmaaktijd
answers_golden_standard: SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE YEAR(created) = 2023 and address_type = 'clinic' ORDER BY created

questions: Display the IDs of the first 250 healthcare providers imported, sorted by last name.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT zorgverlener.id FROM zorgverlener ORDER BY achternaam LIMIT 250
answers_golden_standard: SELECT id FROM systemcaregiver WHERE imported = 1 ORDER BY surname LIMIT 250

questions: Retrieve the IDs of the first 250 caregivers imported, sorted by last name.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT id FROM zorgverlener ORDER BY geslachtsnaam LIMIT 250
answers_golden_standard: SELECT id FROM systemcaregiver WHERE imported = 1 ORDER BY surname LIMIT 250

questions: Give me the number of unique clients and insurance policies with coverage type basic that are currently valid.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id), COUNT(DISTINCT policynumber) FROM verzekering WHERE systeemstatus = 'active' AND dekkingsvorm = 'basic'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT count(DISTINCT patient.id), count(DISTINCT insurancenl.id) FROM patient INNER JOIN insurancenl on patient.id = insurancenl.patient_id WHERE insurancenl.coverage_type = 'basis' and current_date between insurancenl.starting_date and insurancenl.expiration_date

questions: How many unique clients and unique insureds are currently in possession of a valid basic insurance policy?
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT count(*) as num_clients FROM (SELECT client_id FROM verzekeringbasis WHERE standaardwaarde != 0 GROUP BY client_id) AS list_of_clients INNER JOIN patient ON patient.id = list_of_clients.client_id AND huidig = 1 and startdatum <= current_date and einddatum >= current_date and maatschappij = 'AG' and status = 'active' and list_of_clients.client_id not in (SELECT patient_id FROM zorgverzekering WHERE zorgverzekering.startdatum <= current_date and zorgverzekering.einddatum >= current_date) UNION SELECT count(*) as num_patiënten FROM (SELECT patient_id FROM zorgverzekering WHERE zorgverzekering.startdatum <= current_date and zorgverzekering.einddatum >= current_date) AS list_of_patients INNER JOIN patient ON patient.id = list_of_patients.patient_id AND huidig = 1 and startdatum <= current_date and einddatum >= current_date and maatschappij = 'AG' and status = 'active' and patient.id not in (SELECT patient_id FROM zorgverzekering WHERE zorgverzekering.startdatum <= current_date and zorgverzekering.einddatum >= current_date)
answers_golden_standard: SELECT count(DISTINCT patient.id), count(DISTINCT insurancenl.id) FROM patient INNER JOIN insurancenl on patient.id = insurancenl.patient_id WHERE insurancenl.coverage_type = 'basis' and current_date between insurancenl.starting_date and insurancenl.expiration_date

questions: Please show me all appointments that have been cancelled.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT * FROM afspraak WHERE status = 'cancelled'
answers_golden_standard: SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentstatus on appointmentstatus.id = appointment.systemappointmentstatus_id WHERE appointmentstatus.name LIKE '%geannuleerd%'

questions: Please show me a summary of cancelled appointments.
answers_GPT3_5: SELECT afspraak.status, count(*) FROM afspraak WHERE afspraak.status = 'cancelled' GROUP BY afspraak.status
answers_golden_standard: SELECT appointment.* FROM appointment LEFT JOIN appointmentstatus on appointmentstatus.id = appointment.systemappointmentstatus_id WHERE appointmentstatus.name LIKE '%geannuleerd%'
